attributes.action: Keep the hard shoulder on Smart Motorways for emergency use only
attributes.additional_details:
Using the hard shoulder of a Smart Motorway as a live lane puts road users at risk.
It gives stranded motorists no safe place to stop and prevents emergency services from reaching accidents.
Consider the risks presented by using a hard shoulder as a live lane against the significant risks.
attributes.background: Stop the use of hard shoulders as live lanes on smart motorways
